questions.question: Why do we perform Laplace Transform?

answers.a: It is useful for study of transient responses (or time responses) of Linear Time-Invariant Systems (LTIS).
answers.b: It is also utilised to solve complex differential equations.

questions.question: Why Transfer Function is always realised in S domain?

answers.a: To calculate output y(t) of system in time domain the convolution of the input with the response signal is to be calculated. This makes it a complex process.
answers.b: Mathematics involved in Transformation of the equation made the realization easier to understand.

questions.question: What is the Laplace transform of Ramp Response?

Statement: An impulse response is defined as signal caused due to sudden change in amplitude.

Example: Impulse response are taken into consideration while testing breaking mechanism of designed automobile.

answers.a: Example is able to explain the statement.
answers.c: Information provided in example is not enough to draw a conclusion.

questions.question: Which of the following statement is correct?

answers.a: Based on the presence of poles at origin we can classify Type of system
answers.b: Type 0 system has more poles at origin compare to type 1 and 2 system.
